page.title: 03One Day at School
page.content: I go through the gates into the playground at 8.30 a.m. - good, about twenty minutes to play cricket with my friends before the whistle blows. Assembly at 9 a.m.; we sing a hymn, listen to all the teachers giving out notices then the headmaster reads a prayer. Back to the classroom for maths, my favourite, I am doing some work on the temperatures of water as it cools. After playtime I have to go to the library to sort out a problem with library tickets as I am a library monitor. Then I work on my topic about insects, this week I am finding out about ants. Soon it is 12.15 p.m. and time for lunch. In the afternoon we have sci- ence; practical work, we try several experiments on sliding pieces of wood on different surfaces with weights.
